translation.简体中文: 设置 Shapiro-Wilk test 显著水平

translation.English: Whether you want a paired t-test/Wilcoxon Signed-Rank test?
translation.简体中文: 是否进行 Paired t-test/Wilcoxon Signed-Rank test?

translation.English: Applicable for cases which each group has same number of observation.
translation.简体中文: 仅适用于各组记录数量相同的数据

translation.English: Select statistic methods automatically is not always suitable for every case. Histgram and Q-Q plot were also helpful for method selection.
translation.简体中文: 系统推荐之统计方法也许并非总是最佳方法。您也可参考密度图与 Q-Q 图选择统计方法。

translation.English: Whether you want a permutation test?
The Monte Carlo Permutation Tests may be involved in the unknown distribution or small sample size.
translation.简体中文: 建议仅将蒙特卡洛置换检验用于未知分布的数据或小样本量的数据。

translation.English: Adjustment method for p-value for multiple comparisons.
translation.简体中文: 调整 p 值计算方法。

translation.English: The details of adjustment method fo p-value for multiple comparisons
translation.简体中文: 调整 p 值计算方法详情

translation.English: You can also found them from the vignette of
It will display as 0.0000 when a p value less than 0.0001.
translation.简体中文: 当 p 值小于 0.0001 时，将显示为 0.0000

translation.English: Quantile-Quantile plot, aka. Q-Q plot, is a somewhat subjective visual check. However, it is still a useful tool. In some cases, if the sample size is sufficiently large, Shapiro-Wilk Normality test may detect, even trivial departures from the null hypothesis, (i.e., although there may be some statistically significant effect, it may be too small to be of any practical significance); additional investigation by Q-Q plot is typically advisable.
translation.简体中文: 分位数-分位数图（Q-Q 图）是一种通过视觉的方式检查数据分布的工具。当数据样本量足够大，Shapiro-Wilk 正态检验对于数据分布与零假设差异会过于敏感（即监测到不具有实际意义的显著性差异)，此时可以通过 Q-Q 进行额外校验。

translation.English: Do you need the statisiics tests?
translation.简体中文: 是否显示总体检验结果
如何显示组间检验结果

translation.English: P.S. showing figure on this page and downloading figure implement in different code, even the figure in browser lookes massy or wired, the downloaded figure still can meet the standar of publication level with appropriate parameter sets.
translation.简体中文: P.S. 图片尺寸的调整请以下载图片为准。显示图片与下载图片所调用代码不同，因此当网页显示图片出现问题时，请尝试下载图片以获取显示正常的图片。
